dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Welcome to the world of Eldoria, a land of magic and mystery.

dialogue.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogue.text: I am Eryndor Thorne, a skilled warrior from the kingdom of Silverleaf. I have been summoned by the king to investigate strange occurrences in the nearby forest.

dialogue.speaker: Lila Earthsong
dialogue.text: Greetings, Eryndor. I am Lila Earthsong, a druid from the ancient tribe of Oakwood. I have been watching you from afar and sense that you possess great courage and honor.

dialogue.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogue.text: Lila, what do you know of the strange happenings in the forest? I have heard rumors of dark creatures and ancient evils stirring.

dialogue.speaker: Lila Earthsong
dialogue.text: Yes, Eryndor. The balance of nature is indeed shifting. I fear that a great darkness is awakening, one that threatens to consume all in its path.
